means: 送礼者( giver的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: It is nearly always women who are the primary care givers.
sentence.Network_cn: 从事初级保健护理工作的几乎都是女性。

sentence.Network_en: They are very generous givers to charity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们是慈善事业的慷慨捐助者。

sentence.Network_en: Care-givers get a chance to socialize with men and women who are in the same position as themselves.
sentence.Network_cn: 护理员有机会和从事同样工作的人交往。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Speak with the various quest givers and receive your just rewards !, 说话的各种追求度外 , 并接受您刚才的奖励!
不利点 drawback不到 givers不到 insecticide
there are only two kinds of people in the world : givers and takers . the takers may eat better , but the givers sleep better .世上只有两种人：施与者和接受者。接受者可能吃得更好，而施与者睡得更香。
In India , these rivers are the givers of life ., 在印度 , 这些河是生命的赋予者.

entry.def: You can refer to a person or organization that gives or supplies a particular thing as a giver of that thing.

example.ex: Germany is the largest giver of aid among the wealthy countries of the West.
example.tran: 德国是西方富裕国家中给予援助最多的国家。

example.ex: ...a complex social ritual that says a lot about both the giver and the receiver.
example.tran: 关于捐赠者与受援者的复杂的社会礼仪
